name: Real-time TITLE Checker
author: rei.k

sections.description:
Real-time TITLE Checker is a plug-in that allows you to quickly search, narrow down, and check article titles that match keywords entered in the title column from articles you have posted so far.

What title did you put in other articles? What kind of naming convention was used for URLs? Recommended for those who want to confirm immediately.
sections.installation:
1. Upload this plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate “Real-time TITLE Checker” from WordPress’s “plug-in” menu.
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • Changed to search case-insensitive.
  • Changed so that search results are displayed even if the focus deviates from the title input field.
  • Added an option to use 2 bytes of space as word delimiter.

1.0.1

  • Initial working version.

description:
Real-time TITLE Checker is a plug-in that allows you to quickly search, narrow down, and check article titles that match keywords entered in the title column from articles you have posted so far.

What title did you put in other articles? What kind of naming convention was used for URLs? Recommended for those who want to confirm immediately.

screenshots.caption: If there are many search results, scroll to display.
You can also narrow down by entering two or more words.
It is possible to select the target's post type and delimiter.
